solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public String fractionToDecimal(int numerator, int denominator) {--newline--        if (numerator == 0) {--newline--            return "0";--newline--        }--newline--        StringBuilder res = new StringBuilder();--newline--        // "+" or "-"--newline--        res.append(((numerator > 0) ^ (denominator > 0)) ? "-" : "");--newline--        long num = Math.abs((long)numerator);--newline--        long den = Math.abs((long)denominator);--newline--        --newline--        // integral part--newline--        res.append(num / den);--newline--        num %= den;--newline--        if (num == 0) {--newline--            return res.toString();--newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        // fractional part--newline--        res.append(".");--newline--        HashMap<Long, Integer> map = new HashMap<Long, Integer>();--newline--        map.put(num, res.length());--newline--        while (num != 0) {--newline--            num *= 10;--newline--            res.append(num / den);--newline--            num %= den;--newline--            if (map.containsKey(num)) {--newline--                int index = map.get(num);--newline--                res.insert(index, "(");--newline--                res.append(")");--newline--                break;--newline--            }--newline--            else {--newline--                map.put(num, res.length());--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return res.toString();--newline--    }--newline--}
